name: Jumpy
description:
Jumpy is a single player platform game.

In this game the player controls a green ball which bounces around the screen. The object of the game is to collect tokens, they look a bit like bones, while avoiding just about everything else apart from the platforms.

The game has a high score screen and a level editor.

shot.caption: The game area, level oneThe scissors and chainsaw move up and down at different speeds, contact with either is deadly
The high score table comes prepopulated
A life's been lost, should this game carry a blood and gore warning
